state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor Tourist
    Tourist->>+XPO_Tourist_Portal: Forget password
    XPO_Tourist_Portal->>+Tourist_profile: Query tourist profile
    Tourist_profile->>Tourist_profile: generate reset email template
    Tourist_profile->>+XPO_Firebase: call email service
    XPO_Firebase-->>-Tourist_profile: 202 Accepted
    XPO_Firebase->>+Tourist: send email reset password
    Tourist->>+email_client: Click link reset password on email
    email_client-->>XPO_Firebase: 200, success 
    XPO_Firebase-->>Tourist: redirect to XPO Tourist portal
    Tourist->>XPO_Tourist_Portal: Fill-in new password
    XPO_Tourist_Portal->>Tourist_profile: update new password
    Tourist_profile->>Tourist_profile: commited new password
    Tourist_profile->>+XPO_Firebase: send temp plate email confirm password changed
    XPO_Firebase-->>-Tourist_profile: 202 Accepted
    XPO_Firebase->>email_client: send email confirm password changed  
    Tourist_profile-->>XPO_Tourist_Portal: Password had been reset

erDiagram
    
    Tourist }|--|{ Profile: "create profile"
    Profile {
        uuid accound_id 
        uuid trx_id
        string firstname
        string middlename
        string lastname
        string email
        varchar(32) password
        varchar(20) passport
        char(10) gender
        string nationality
        date date_of_birth
        boolean email_verified
        date create_at
        date update_at
        string firstname_hash
        string lastname_hash
        string email_hash
        string passport_hash
        boolean is_Active
    }
    Tourist||--|{ collect_spending : spending
    collect_spending {
        uuid accound_id 
        uuid   trx_id
        string firstname
        string middlename
        string lastname
        string email
        char(10) gender
        string nationality
        date date_of_birth
        string edc_id
        string edc_token
        uuid edc_trx_id
        varchar(25) building
        string tenant_name
        string receipt_id
        date receipt_date
        number total_amount
        date edc_create_at
        date edc_update_at
        uuid void_trx_id
        string cashier_name
    }
